home_header_third: a modern company for constructionand repair
name: Name
who_are_we_text: Vipa Stroy is a family buisness, led by experts in construction. Founded in 2005, by engineer Nikolay Andreev, the company goes throught different types of projects, such as construction of residential building, construction of single-family houses, maintenance, repairs, consultions, composing and controling projects. Our team consists of experienced profesionals that can guarantee the quality of work.
our_goal_text: Quality. We are accustomed to the solid traditions in the area of construction and we follow them strictly, without compromising. We set our goal to create products, that stand the test of time.
why_us_text: We have over 30 years of experience in working in the world of construction. At highest value we place our clients and we strive to create healthy professional releations, that are based on trust, respect and reliability. We provide clean terms and reliable agreements. More than that, we value active communication between clients and providers.
